item.description:
Come join us for a great weekend at the Innitous Ski Runners Ski Club Thanksgiving Weekend.  The weekend will be spent doing hiking, snow skiing, outlet shopping, eating out or having a nice group dinner etc. 

Please let us know if you would like to attend.

Jenstuart1966@aol.com

Including Members & guests, we are expecting a good group of people to bunk at the Club Fri & Sat nights!  Guests are welcome to stay overnight at our renovated Ski Club.  Days will be spent Hiking, Fishing, Golfing or Shopping, Skiing Attitash and Wildcat are both open!!!! - Nights will be spent Eating, Drinking & Socializing!!

Friday - arrive at the Club & watch the crowd roll-in, or stroll over to the Red Parka.  There is also an organized Saturday Social scheduled.

Saturday - some will be Hiking, Biking, Fishing, Golfing, or Shopping.  There is an organized Sat afternoon Social scheduled.  Afterwards, head out for Dinner, or Home-cook at the Club.  There is also an organized Social on Sat night! 

Sunday - sleep late, enjoy a big breakfast, or eat out and then head back home.

There will be many activities happening in the Mount Washington Valley throughout the weekend

Interested in joining us?  Contact Jenny  203-610-3039 for more details.
item.how_to_find_us: The big white house on station street across from the Red Parka Pub.

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Come join us at the Innitou Ski Runners SKi Club on Thanksgiving Weekeend
